      • TrinketPattern

        public TrinketPattern(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String type,
                      int value,
                      java.lang.String icon,
                      java.util.List<Modifier> bonuses,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> equipEffects,
                      java.util.List<Requirement> equipReq,
                      java.lang.String actionType,
                      java.lang.String actionId)
        Trinket pattern constructor
        Parameters:
        id - Trinket ID
        type - String with trinket type name
        level - Level required to use this item (only for backward compatibility, now requirement in WaponPattern#equipReq)
        value - Item value
        icon - Item icon for GUI
        bonuses - Item bonuses
        equipEffects - List with IDs of all equip Effects
        actionType - Type of on-click action
        actionId - ID for on-click action
